alert.note: Alert for White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern White County through 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sautee, or 9 miles northeast of Cleveland. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helen, Unicoi State Park, Anna Ruby Falls, Robertstown and Sautee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Georgia.
